Hello. I'm Hoyeol Kim.

I'm a mobile developer, currently living in Texas.

SafeKey - Password Manager

A secure password manager that supports syncing through iCloud. I developed this app, using SwiftUI, SwiftData, CloudKit, StoreKit, Local Authentication, UserDefaults, and KitTextField.

iOS_Development Swift SwiftUI UIKit SwiftData CloudKit StoreKit Local_Auth

NeonLED - LED Banner

I developed this app in SwiftUI and localized it for languages, such as Korean and Japanese.

iOS_Development Swift SwiftUI UIKit Localization

K-Town Rewards

I developed the app in UIKit, implementing features like badge notifications, point systems, and payment functions.

iOS_Development Swift UIKit RESTful_API Firebase JSON

KoreanKitchen

I developed this Android app in Kotlin, KoreanKitchen, featuring Korean food recipes with RecyclerView, CardView, JSON parsing, Glide for image loading, Parcelable for data transfer, and animated view transitions.

Kotlin JSON Glide Parcelable RecyclerView CardView
